mapper.select: SELECT e.first_name||' '||e.last_name name, e.*, d.department_name, j.job_title,m.first_name||' '||m.last_name manager_name FROM employees e LEFT JOIN departments d ON e.department_id=d.department_id INNER JOIN jobs j ON e.job_id = j.job_id LEFT JOIN employees m ON e.manager_id=m.employee_id WHERE e.employee_id = #{employee_id}
